name: unrecovered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something that is lost or spent is unrecovered, you have not got it back: The figures do not include unrecovered costs. A total vehicle loss is where your vehicle is written off, or stolen and unrecovered. Compare
unrecoverable
More examplesFewer examplesThere were more than 1,300 missing-property reports, including more than £2 million in stolen and unrecovered property.The Council decided to write off more than £70,000 in unrecovered rent arrears.The memorial for the victims of the disaster sits above the area where they think most of the unrecovered bodies rest.
